column4: okay, first problem. The system has told me that it's using restricted drivers (Atheros HAL and Support for Atheros 802.11 wireless LAN cards), but I cannot connect. When I go to network, everything is greyed out
oh
there's something new
what Network?
didn't notice the 'unlock' thing
that's new to me...was it introduced in 7.x? (unlock)
nope, it is introduced in Hardy I think
I have never seen that before in Gutsy
that filesystem check thing is looking more like windows xp.... :S
okay, wireless card finds my connection...I've got the right WEP key...let's see
works!!
congrat wepeel :)
my very first impression of hardy heron is that it's fast
I second that. for me, only pulseaudio is troublesome.
I recommend you to check out gnome-main-menu
will I need to get that?
using sudo apt-get install gnome-main-menu
it looks like this http://img137.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshotak2.png
that looks like something I'll like, thanks!
do I need to add a repository to get it?
don't think so. it is already in the default repo's
not found let me try updating as I haven't had this done yet
sudo apt-get update  , do that first
done... hehe one step ahead That's a first :)
